item.title: Match Outlook 因优先考虑 Tinder 产品测试而失手
item.description: Match Group Inc. 公布的第四季度营收展望低于预期，并警告称，其最大的约会应用 Tinder 的产品测试将以牺牲短期收益为代价。【原文：Match Group Inc. provided a weaker-than-expected fourth-quarter revenue outlook and warned that product testing at its largest dating app, Tinder, will come at the expense of short-term gains.】

item.title: Pinterest 预计假日季度销售疲软，股价下跌
item.description: Pinterest Inc. 预计本季度营收低于分析师预期，这表明尽管假日购物季即将到来，但该搜索平台的广告业务增长速度可能不及预期。该股在盘后交易中暴跌达 19%。【原文：Pinterest Inc. projected revenue for the current quarter that fell short of analysts’ estimates, a sign that the search platform’s advertising business may not be growing as quickly as expected despite the upcoming holiday shopping season. The stock plunged as much as 19% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: 加拿大将为国防企业注资以实施重组计划
item.description: (彭博社）--加拿大将更广泛地利用一家国有银行为国防工业公司提供贷款和风险资本，这是加拿大从增加军费开支中榨取经济利益的一系列措施的一部分。【原文：(Bloomberg) - Canada will make broader use of a state-owned bank to provide loans and venture capital to companies in the defense industry, part of a suite of measures to squeeze economic benefits from an increase in military spending.】

item.title: 加拿大加快企业投资和研究注销速度
item.description: 加拿大政府将继续执行去年宣布的措施，允许一些企业加快注销机器设备的速度，并立即将研发成本计入费用，以节省企业税。【原文：Canada’s government will proceed with measures announced last year to allow some businesses to speed up how quickly they write off machinery and equipment, as well as to expense research and development costs immediately to save on corporate taxes.】

item.title: 卡尼政府在预算中瞄准银行业竞争
item.description: 加拿大政府正瞄准金融业的竞争，承诺解决收费问题，让消费者更容易更换银行，并减轻小型贷款机构的监管负担。【原文：Canada’s government is taking aim at competition in the financial sector, pledging to tackle fees, make it easier for consumers to switch banks and reduce regulatory burdens for smaller lenders.】

item.title: 美国首次公开募股（IPO）的选择范围缩小，因为停摆导致交易无法在感恩节前完成
item.description: 由于美国证券交易委员会的申报审查职能受到限制，政府的长期停摆正在慢慢粉碎那些仍想在年底前上市而不想采取变通办法的公司的希望。【原文：The protracted government shutdown is slowly crushing the hopes of companies that still want to go public before the end of the year without resorting to a workaround while the US Securities and Exchange Commission’s filing review functions are curtailed.】
